content: repeats or until desired extra plain rounds between the increase rounds length ending on round 12 work rounds 1-3 once more chart b is worked 7 8 times per round turn heel heel turn is worked back and forth row 1 rs k34 36 k2tog k1 turn set-up for heel expansion row 2 ws slip 1 p6 p2tog p1 turn medium row 3 slip 1 k7 k2tog k1 turn row 4 slip 1 p8 p2tog p1 turn round 1 p32 pm to indicate start of instep p37 pm to indicate end of instep slip remaining stitch onto continue working one more stitch until all the left hand needle 37 instep sts/33 heel sts stitches have been worked you should end on an round 2 k2 m1 pm to indicate start of heel sts k3 even row with 35 37 sts remaining cdd k3 yo k1 yo twice k3 cdd k3 pm to indicate end of heel sts m1 k2 sm work 37 transition row rs instep sts in chart c medium slip 1 ssk k12 ssk k1 k2tog k12 k2tog k1 sm knit instep sts in pattern as established large 37 instep sts/31 sole sts round 1 p34 pm to indicate start of instep p43 pm to indicate end of instep slip remaining 3 sts onto large slip 1 ssk k31 k2tog k1 sm knit instep left hand needle 43 instep sts/37 heel sts sts in pattern as established pm to indicate round 2 p3 pm to indicate start of heel sts k1 yo beginning of round 43 instep sts/35 sole sts k3 cdd k3 yo 3 times k1 pm to indicate end of heel sts k3 sm work 43 instep stitches in chart c foot work foot as established chart c on instep and stockinette on sole until foot measures fleegle heel all sizes instep and heel are worked approximately 2 1/2 inches less than desired foot length ending on row 12 of chart c work row 1- in the round 9 of chart c once work chart d on instep sts once round 1 k3 sm k27 31 sm k3 sm work instep knit one round even begin toe 31 35 instep sts in pattern as established pm to indicate sts/31 35 sole sts beginning of round round 2 k2 kll knit to first heel marker sm slip 1 note if foot is not long enough to begin toe k1 13 15 times slip 1 sm knit to last 2 sts continue to knit in stockinette stitch until foot is 1 before first instep marker krl k2 sm work instep 1/2 1 3/4 inches less than desired foot length sts in pattern as established round 3 knit to first heel marker sm k27 31 sm knit to first instep marker work instep sts in pattern toe as established round 1 decrease round k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 slip continue working rounds 2-3 until there are 100 marker k1 ssk
